n1ql_queries.name-filter: SELECT _sync.channels as _channels, name, country, type from `travel-sample` WHERE country IS NOT NULL and name IS NOT NULL

n1ql_queries.beer: SELECT _sync.channels as _channels, beer, META(default).id from default WHERE beer IS NOT NULL
n1ql_queries.good: SELECT _sync.channels as _channels, beer, good, META(default).id from default WHERE good IS NOT NULL
n1ql_queries.nofilter: SELECT good, beer as bier, META(default).id from default WHERE beer IS NOT NULL
n1ql_queries.beer-positional: SELECT _sync.channels as _channels, beer, META(default).id from default WHERE beer = $1
n1ql_queries.beer-named: SELECT _sync.channels as _channels, beer, META(default).id from default WHERE beer = $beer
n1ql_queries.from-param: SELECT true as filter WHERE $1.beer = "cider" and $1.good = true
